channel.title: docker-compose on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: docker 和 docker-compose 的安装
item.description: docker 安装 直接执行脚本即可： 1 curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh && sudo sh get-docker.sh 查看Docker的版本 1 docker version 安装 docker-compose 直接执行脚本即可： 1 curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.22.0/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 安装完成之后设置权限 1 chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
